price: although we thought that humans and jinn would never tell lies about Allah.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
